trans-unit.source: Setting up Azure AD Join for your users| Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Setting up Azure AD Join for your users| Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A topic that explains how administrators can set up Azure AD Join for their end users (employees, students, other users).
trans-unit.target: A topic that explains how administrators can set up Azure AD Join for their end users (employees, students, other users).

trans-unit.source: Setting up Azure AD Join in your organization
trans-unit.target: Setting up Azure AD Join in your organization

trans-unit.source: Before you set up Azure AD Join, you need to either sync up your on-premises directory of users to the cloud or manually create managed accounts in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: Before you set up Azure AD Join, you need to either sync up your on-premises directory of users to the cloud or manually create managed accounts in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: Detailed instructions for syncing your on-prem users to Azure AD is covered in [Integrating your on-premises identities with Azure Active Directory](active-directory-aadconnect.md).
trans-unit.target: Detailed instructions for syncing your on-prem users to Azure AD is covered in [Integrating your on-premises identities with Azure Active Directory](active-directory-aadconnect.md).

trans-unit.source: To manually create and manage users in Azure AD, refer to [User management in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/hh967609.aspx).
trans-unit.target: To manually create and manage users in Azure AD, refer to [User management in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/hh967609.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Set up device registration
trans-unit.target: Set up device registration

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the Azure Portal as Administrator.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the Azure Portal as Administrator.

trans-unit.source: On the left pane, select Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: On the left pane, select Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: On the **Directory** tab, select your directory.
trans-unit.target: On the **Directory** tab, select your directory.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Configure** tab.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Configure** tab.

trans-unit.source: Scroll to the section called **Devices**.
trans-unit.target: Scroll to the section called **Devices**.

trans-unit.source: On the **devices** tab, set the following:
trans-unit.target: On the **devices** tab, set the following:

trans-unit.source: **Maximum number of devices per user**: Select the maximum number of devices a user can have in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: **Maximum number of devices per user**: Select the maximum number of devices a user can have in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: If a user reaches this quota, they will not be able to add additional devices until one or more of their existing devices are removed.
trans-unit.target: If a user reaches this quota, they will not be able to add additional devices until one or more of their existing devices are removed.

trans-unit.source: **Require multi-factor auth to join devices**: Enable when users should provide a second factor of authentication to join their device to Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: **Require multi-factor auth to join devices**: Enable when users should provide a second factor of authentication to join their device to Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: For more information on multi-factor auth, see [Getting started with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication in the cloud](multi-factor-authentication-get-started-cloud/)
trans-unit.target: For more information on multi-factor auth, see [Getting started with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication in the cloud](multi-factor-authentication-get-started-cloud/)

trans-unit.source: **Users may Azure AD join devices**:Select the users and groups that are allowed to join devices to Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: **Users may Azure AD join devices**:Select the users and groups that are allowed to join devices to Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: **Additional administrators on Azure AD Joined devices**: With Azure AD Premium or the Enterprise Mobility Suite (EMS), you can choose which users are granted local administrator rights to the device.
trans-unit.target: **Additional administrators on Azure AD Joined devices**: With Azure AD Premium or the Enterprise Mobility Suite (EMS), you can choose which users are granted local administrator rights to the device.

trans-unit.source: Global Administrators and the device owner are granted local administrator rights by default.
trans-unit.target: Global Administrators and the device owner are granted local administrator rights by default.

trans-unit.source: After you set up Azure AD Join for your users, they can connect to Azure AD through their corporate or personal devices.
trans-unit.target: After you set up Azure AD Join for your users, they can connect to Azure AD through their corporate or personal devices.

trans-unit.source: Following are the three scenarios how you can enable your users to set up Azure AD Join:
trans-unit.target: Following are the three scenarios how you can enable your users to set up Azure AD Join:

trans-unit.source: Users join a company-owned device directly to Azure AD
trans-unit.target: Users join a company-owned device directly to Azure AD

trans-unit.source: Users domain Join a company-owned device to on-premises Active Directory and extend to Azure AD
trans-unit.target: Users domain Join a company-owned device to on-premises Active Directory and extend to Azure AD

trans-unit.source: Users add work accounts to Windows on a personal device
trans-unit.target: Users add work accounts to Windows on a personal device

trans-unit.source: Additional Information
trans-unit.target: Additional Information

trans-unit.source: Extending cloud capabilities to Windows 10 devices through Azure Active Directory Join
trans-unit.target: Extending cloud capabilities to Windows 10 devices through Azure Active Directory Join

trans-unit.source: Learn about usage scenarios for Azure AD Join
trans-unit.target: Learn about usage scenarios for Azure AD Join

trans-unit.source: Set up Azure AD Join
trans-unit.target: Set up Azure AD Join
